FaiRank

This site is the homepage for FaiRank research group. We quantify and address unfairness of ranking in online platforms.

Here, you will find links to our work, as well as open-source data and code from our research.

Publications

  • Elbassuoni, Shady, Sihem Amer-Yahia, Ahmad Ghizzawi, and Christine El Atie (2019). "Exploring Fairness of Ranking in Online Job Marketplaces". In EDBT, pp. 646-649.
    Poster Code
  • Ghizzawi, A., Marinescu, J., Elbassuoni, S., Amer-Yahia, S., and Bisson, G. (2019). "FaiRank: An Interactive System to Explore Fairness of Ranking in Online Job Marketplaces". In EDBT, pp. 582-585.
    Poster
